com.saptarshidebnath.lib.processrunner.output

Class OutputImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.saptarshidebnath.lib.processrunner.output.OutputImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Output

    class OutputImpl
extends Object
implements Output
    Default Implementation of Output.

    If the masterlog file is configured, the class gives the ability to :-

    • Save the OutputSourceType.SYSOUT to a file.
    • Save the OutputSourceType.SYSERR to a file.
    • Save both OutputSourceType.ALL to file.
    • Search the master log file for a regular expression pattern.
    • get the return code and the actual log file if saved while executing the program.

      • saveSysOut

        public File saveSysOut(File sysOut)
                throws ProcessConfigurationException,
                       IOException
        Prints the OutputRecord.getOutputText() of type OutputSourceType.SYSOUT to the File supplied.
        Specified by:
        saveSysOut in interface Output
        Parameters:
        sysOut - A File object where the log is going to be written.
        Returns:
        A File object where the log has been written. May return null if master log file was not configured. Please see Configuration.ConfigBuilder.setMasterLogFile(File, boolean) and Configuration.ConfigBuilder.setMasterLogFile(File, boolean, Charset) for more details on how to set Master log file.
        Throws:
        IOException - In case of any IO Error while writing to disk.
        ProcessConfigurationException - if master log is accessed without configuring the same.

      • getMasterLogAsJson

        public File getMasterLogAsJson()
                        throws ProcessConfigurationException
        Returns the master log file originally captured while executing the Process. Its an Json Array of type OutputRecord.
        Specified by:
        getMasterLogAsJson in interface Output
        Returns:
        A File master pointing to the Master log file. May return null if master log file was not configured. Please see Configuration.ConfigBuilder.setMasterLogFile(File, boolean) and Configuration.ConfigBuilder.setMasterLogFile(File, boolean, Charset) for more details on how to set Master log file.

      • searchMasterLog

        public boolean searchMasterLog(String regex)
                        throws IOException,
                               ProcessConfigurationException
        Search the content of the Configuration.getMasterLogFile() for a particular regex. The search is done line by line.
        Specified by:
        searchMasterLog in interface Output
        Parameters:
        regex - a proper Regular Expression that need to be searched for.
        Returns:
        a Boolean.TRUE or Boolean.FALSE depending upon if the search is positive or negative. Please see Configuration.ConfigBuilder.setMasterLogFile(File, boolean) and Configuration.ConfigBuilder.setMasterLogFile(File, boolean, Charset) for more details on how to set Master log file.
        Throws:
        IOException - In case of any IO error.
        ProcessConfigurationException - if master log is accessed without configuring the same.

      • grepForRegex

        public List<OutputRecord> grepForRegex(String regex)
                                throws IOException,
                                       ProcessConfigurationException
        Searches the file for the regular expression and returns a List of type String containing all the matching lines.
        Specified by:
        grepForRegex in interface Output
        Parameters:
        regex - accepts a String object to search for
        Returns:
        a List of OutputRecord containing all the lines in the output that have matched the regex
        Throws:
        IOException - if there are any error reading the master log file.
        ProcessConfigurationException - if master log file not configured to be saved when the process is started and later user is trying to grep for non existent file.
